<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The LiveIntervalCalc class is an extension of LiveRangeCalc targeted to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// computation and modification of the LiveInterval variants of LiveRanges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LiveIntervals are meant to track liveness of registers and stack slots and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LiveIntervalCalc adds to LiveRangeCalc all the machinery required to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construct the liveness of virtual registers tracked by a LiveInterval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If @p LR is a main range, or if @p LI is null, then all uses must be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// jointly dominated by the definitions from @p LR. If @p LR is a subrange</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of the live interval @p LI, corresponding to lane mask @p LaneMask,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// all uses must be jointly dominated by the definitions from @p LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// together with definitions of other lanes where @p LR becomes undefined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (via &lt;def,read-undef&gt; operands).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If @p LR is a main range, the @p LaneMask should be set to ~0, i.e.</span></CodeLine>
